ISSUE.TITLE: XC Swager UI fails to load in local docker container
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Can't get access to XC Swager UI from locally running docker container with "Failed to load API definition" error. My production-ready environment with same NocoDB image and Postgres database works as expected. The one known difference is no SSL. For local testing I run NocoDB with flowing: ``` docker run -d --name nocodb-v90 -p 8080:8080 \ -e TZ=Europe/Moscow \ -e NC_DB="pg://....." \ -e NC_AUTH_JWT_SECRET="................" \ -e NC_INVITE_ONLY_SIGNUP="true" \ --net=host \ nocodb/nocodb:0.90.7 ``` <details> <summary>error .png</summary> ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/61871501/165520410-373ac0db-c0d2-4aa7-bf62-e655682e1011.png) </details> Node: **v12.22.12** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **true** RootDB: **pg** PackageVersion: **0.90.7**

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: pass correct project id to get model list get models from current project to populate swagger json for current project re #1899 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: handle `null` case if colOpt is missing re #1900 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>
